plot: Irresistible, one-woman shopping phenomenon Becky Bloomwood is back in this hilarious, heartwarming, New York Times bestselling tale of married life, best friends, and long-lost sisters (and the perils of simply having to own an Angel handbag!).
characters: Becky Bloomwood, Luke Brandon, Megan, Susan Cleath-Stuart, Tarquin Cleath-Stuart
